{"1":"Use arrow keys to navigate or WASD.","2":"Made by my younger brother.","3":"Made by SteveIndoPlayScratch","4":"Also still by SteveIndoPlayScratch","5":"Yes it is still made by SteveIndoPlayScratch (SIPS)","6":"Made by SIPS, press 'e' or switch button to toggle switch.","7":"The children yearns for the mine, made by SIPS.","8":"Imagine having to use an oven","9":"This is interesting!","10":"Made by SIPS","11":"Made by SIPS","12":"Made by SIPS","13":"Levels will be made by Kenzie Shane S.
